markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quick Stow (Ratfolk)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1304) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=234" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 23 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per round

**Prerequisites**
[Cheek Pouches](/Feats.aspx?ID=1295)

</column>

---

You are adept at quickly moving items into your cheek pouches. You Interact to store one held item in your cheek pouches (provided it fits).
name: Quick Stow (Ratfolk)
